DESCRI

description: Details required by Condition 6 (details of lighting statement) of Planning Permission 14/13247/FUL (Erection of new buildings of 4 to 16 storeys in height and part demolition, alterations and change of use of Former Post Office and Former Telephone Exchange listed buildings to provide 2,141 sqm of retail/ cafe/ restaurant uses (A1-A5 use) and 638 sqm of flexible floorspace to be used for either retail/caf√©/restaurant uses (A1-A5) or Office (B1), 931 sqm of Office (B1) floorspace and 253 sqm of community/leisure (D1/D2 use) and 319 residential units. 132 car parking spaces proposed with access from Ashdown Road and 610 cycle parking spaces.)
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the condition, as noted above, is fully discharged.
You are advised that the time restrictions set out in condition 3 relate to public opening hours, and would allow for setting up of stalls etc prior to opening.
